languages.text: {n}Арбитес чуть кашляет.{/n} "Ладно, удовлетворю ваш интерес. Есть у меня одна особая тренировка, которая помогает оттачивать охотничьи инстинкты Глейто: я беру несколько гильз и прячу их в труднодоступных местах. Как-то раз после рейда на мануфакторум я устроил Глейто раздолье в заброшенном цехе, но с одной гильзой схитрил и закинул ее на потолочную балку. Тогда уже схитрил Глейто — сидел под балкой, пока я не подошел, прыгнул мне на плечи и забрался наверх. Раскроил мне когтем висок и чуть ключицу не сломал, но до гильзы добрался".

{n}He lets out a small cough.{/n} "Fine, let me satisfy your curiosity. I do have a special exercise that helps to sharpen Glaito's hunting instincts: I take a few ammo casings and hide them in hard-to-reach places. One time, after a raid on a manufactorum, I gave him a whole abandoned workshop to run around in, but I also played a trick on him by throwing one casing onto a ceiling beam. Then, it was Glaito's turn to play tricks: he waited under the beam until I walked up to him, then, he jumped onto my shoulders and climbed to the top. He cut my temple open with his claw and almost broke my clavicle, but he got the casing."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは小さく咳払いした。{/n}「いいでしょう。あなたの好奇心を満たしてあげます。グライトの狩猟本能を鍛えるための特別な訓練は確かにあります。弾薬の薬莢をいくつか、人目につきにくい場所に隠すんです。以前、聖工場の強襲作戦のあとに、廃棄された作業場を丸ごとグライトに使わせたことがあります。その時、ちょっとしたいたずらで、薬莢の一つを天井の梁に投げて引っ掛けてやりました。すると今度は、グライトが仕返しをしてきました。彼は梁の下でじっと待ち、私が近づいた瞬間に肩に飛び乗って、そのまま上に登ったんです。彼の爪でこめかみを切られ、鎖骨も折れそうになりましたが、彼は薬莢を手に入れました」
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a small cough.{/n} "Fine, let me satisfy your curiosity. I do have a special exercise that helps to sharpen Glaito's hunting instincts: I take a few ammo casings and hide them in hard-to-reach places. One time, after a raid on a manufactorum, I gave him a whole abandoned workshop to run around in, but I also played a trick on him by throwing one casing onto a ceiling beam. Then, it was Glaito's turn to play tricks: he waited under the beam until I walked up to him, then, he jumped onto my shoulders and climbed to the top. He cut my temple open with his claw and almost broke my clavicle, but he got the casing."

languages.text: {n}Er hüstelt kurz.{/n} "Gut, ich will Eure Neugier befriedigen. Ich habe eine Spezialübung, um Glaitos Jagdinstinkte zu schärfen: Ich nehme einige Munitionshülsen und verstecke sie an schwer zugänglichen Stellen. Einmal habe ich ihn nach einem Angriff auf ein Manufactorum auf eine ganze leere Werkstatt losgelassen und ihm dabei einen Streich gespielt, indem ich eine der Hülsen auf einen Dachbalken geworfen habe. Daraufhin hat Glaito mir einen Streich gespielt: Er wartete unter dem Balken, bis ich zu ihm ging, sprang dann auf meine Schultern und kletterte nach oben. Dabei hat er mir mit einer Klaue die Schläfe aufgerissen und mir fast das Schlüsselbein gebrochen, aber die Hülse hat er sich geholt."
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a small cough.{/n} "Fine, let me satisfy your curiosity. Then, it was Glaito's turn to play tricks: he waited under the beam until I walked up to him, then, he jumped onto my shoulders and climbed to the top. He cut my temple open with his claw and almost broke my clavicle, but he got the casing."

Daraufhin hat Glaito mir einen Streich gespielt: Er wartete unter dem Balken, bis ich zu ihm ging, sprang dann auf meine Schultern und kletterte nach oben. Dabei hat er mir mit einer Klaue die Schläfe aufgerissen und mir fast das Schlüsselbein gebrochen, aber die Hülse hat er sich geholt."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne toussote.{/n} « Fort bien, je vais assouvir votre curiosité. J'emploie un exercice un peu particulier pour entretenir l'instinct de chasseur de Glaito : je prends quelques douilles de munitions et je les dissimule dans des endroits peu accessibles. Une fois, après un assaut sur un manufactorum, je lui ai demandé de fouiller tout un atelier. J'ai voulu lui jouer un tour en cachant une douille au-dessus d'une poutre du plafond. Mais c'est lui qui a eu le dernier mot : il s'est assis sous la poutre, refusant de bouger jusqu'à ce que je le rejoigne. Là, il s'est servi de moi comme d'un tremplin pour sauter. Il m'a déchiré la tempe de ses griffes et a failli me briser la clavicule, mais il a retrouvé la douille. »
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a small cough.{/n} "Fine, let me satisfy your curiosity. I do have a special exercise that helps to sharpen Glaito's hunting instincts: I take a few ammo casings and hide them in hard-to-reach places. One time, after a raid on a manufactorum, I gave him a whole abandoned workshop to run around in, but I also played a trick on him by throwing one casing onto a ceiling beam. Then, it was Glaito's turn to play tricks: he waited under the beam until I walked up to him, then, he jumped onto my shoulders and climbed to the top. He cut my temple open with his claw and almost broke my clavicle, but he got the casing."

Il m'a déchiré la tempe de ses griffes et a failli me briser la clavicule, mais il a retrouvé la douille. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne carraspea.{/n} «Está bien, voy a satisfacer su curiosidad. Tengo un ejercicio especial que me permite agudizar los instintos de caza de Glaito: consigo unos cuantos casquillos vacíos y los escondo en lugares poco accesibles. En una ocasión, después de una redada en un manufactorum, lo llevé a un taller vacío para que corretease a gusto, pero también le gasté una broma arrojando un casquillo a una viga del techo. Luego Glaito me la devolvió: esperó debajo de la viga hasta que me acerqué a él, luego saltó sobre mis hombros y se encaramó al techo. Me hizo un corte en la sien con una garra y casi me parte la clavícula, pero al final recuperó el casquillo».
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a small cough.{/n} "Fine, let me satisfy your curiosity. I do have a special exercise that helps to sharpen Glaito's hunting instincts: I take a few ammo casings and hide them in hard-to-reach places. He cut my temple open with his claw and almost broke my clavicle, but he got the casing."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙轻轻咳嗽了一声。{/n}“好吧，让我来满足你的好奇心吧。我确实为它准备了一项特别训练，可以锻炼它的狩猎本能。我会拿几个弹壳，把它们藏在难以触及的地方。之前有一次，我们突袭了一个作坊之后，我在整个废弃的车间里藏了几枚弹壳，让它跑来跑去到处找。不过我耍了个心眼，我把其中一枚弹壳丢到了天花板的横梁上。之后，格雷托也和我耍了个心眼——它一直在横梁下面等着，等我走过去之后，它突然蹿上了我的肩膀，跳到了房梁上。它的爪子划开了我的太阳穴，还差点踩断了我的锁骨，但成功拿到了那个弹壳。”
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a small cough.{/n} "Fine, let me satisfy your curiosity. I do have a special exercise that helps to sharpen Glaito's hunting instincts: I take a few ammo casings and hide them in hard-to-reach places. One time, after a raid on a manufactorum, I gave him a whole abandoned workshop to run around in, but I also played a trick on him by throwing one casing onto a ceiling beam. Then, it was Glaito's turn to play tricks: he waited under the beam until I walked up to him, then, he jumped onto my shoulders and climbed to the top. He cut my temple open with his claw and almost broke my clavicle, but he got the casing."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙轻轻咳嗽了一声。{/n}“好吧，让我来满足你的好奇心吧。我确实为它准备了一项特别训练，可以锻炼它的狩猎本能。我会拿几个弹壳，把它们藏在难以触及的地方。之前有一次，我们突袭了一个作坊之后，我在整个废弃的车间里藏了几枚弹壳，让它跑来跑去到处找。不过我耍了个心眼，我把其中一枚弹壳丢到了天花板的横梁上。之后，格雷托也和我耍了个心眼——它一直在横梁下面等着，等我走过去之后，它突然蹿上了我的肩膀，跳到了房梁上。它的爪子划开了我的太阳穴，还差点踩断了我的锁骨，但成功拿到了那个弹壳。”

languages.text: {n}Hafifçe öksürüyor.{/n} "Peki, merakınızı gidereyim. Glaito'nun avcılık içgüdülerini keskinleştirmeye yardımcı olan özel bir egzersizim var. Birkaç mühimmat kovanı alır ve ulaşılması zor yerlere saklarım. Bir keresinde bir fabrikaya yapılan baskından sonra etrafta koştursun diye onu terk edilmiş koca bir atölyeye götürdüm. Glatio koştururken de bir kovanı tavan kirişine fırlatarak ona bir oyun oynadım. Sonra oyun oynama sırası Glaito'ya geldi. Kirişin altında ben yanına gelene kadar bekledi, ardından omuzlarıma atladı ve tepeme tırmandı. Pençesiyle şakağımı yardı, az kalsın köprücük kemiğimi kıracaktı ama kovanı almayı başardı."
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a small cough.{/n} "Fine, let me satisfy your curiosity. I do have a special exercise that helps to sharpen Glaito's hunting instincts: I take a few ammo casings and hide them in hard-to-reach places. One time, after a raid on a manufactorum, I gave him a whole abandoned workshop to run around in, but I also played a trick on him by throwing one casing onto a ceiling beam. Then, it was Glaito's turn to play tricks: he waited under the beam until I walked up to him, then, he jumped onto my shoulders and climbed to the top. He cut my temple open with his claw and almost broke my clavicle, but he got the casing."

Kirişin altında ben yanına gelene kadar bekledi, ardından omuzlarıma atladı ve tepeye tırmandı. Pençesiyle şakağımı yardı, az kalsın köprücük kemiğimi kıracaktı ama kovanı almayı başardı."
